text:
Page Two
Season for setting up all of these items is to let you know
my intentions on reporting, and to also indicate that I*m way behind in
much of my work.
May even send this via Skomia to Ann Arbor, so you can get
earlier, and one some matters Harry can give you his impressions of
my impressions, anyhow.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Prank E. Schooley
CC: Skomia
